Package cliapp.commands.cli

Class CLICommand

java.lang.Object
commands.Command
cliapp.commands.cli.CLICommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExecuteCommand, ExitCommand, HelpCommand, HistoryCommand, SetFuzzyCommand
public abstract class CLICommand extends Command
A basic class for all commands that use a CLIClient as a receiver.
